techacademyheroinfo.Descriptiton: The world of business presents a variety of roles and opportunities, and with the advent of technology. Our range of courses includes Cyber Security, Big data & IoT, Cloud Computing, and Web Development; which will equip you with the required skills in the tech world.

webdev.title: Frontend Development
webdev.description: Frontend programming often develops interfaces through which the application interacts with users.

webdev.title: Backend Development
webdev.description: The backend code communicates with the server and distributes information or data to the users.

webdev.title: Fullstack Development
webdev.description: Full stack web developers can create full-fledged web applications and websites.

cloudcomputing.title: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions
cloudcomputing.description: This course provides the knowledge and skills to design and implement DevOps processes and practices.

cloudcomputing.title: Microsoft Azure Architect Design
cloudcomputing.description: This course teaches Solutions Architects how to translate business requirements into secure, scalable, and reliable solutions.

cloudcomputing.title: Microsoft Azure Architect Technology
cloudcomputing.description: This course teaches Solutions Architects how to translate business requirements into secure, and reliable solutions.

cloudcomputing.title: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions
cloudcomputing.description: This course provides the knowledge and skills to design and implement DevOps processes and practices.

cloudcomputing.title: Administering Relational Databases on Microsoft Azure
cloudcomputing.description: This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to administer a SQL Server database infrastructure.

cybersecurity.title: Risk Management
cybersecurity.description: This course will introduce you to the cybersecurity and Information technology/security world of managing risks of projects.

cybersecurity.title: Security Audit
cybersecurity.description: This course introduces key processes, systems, and documentation used in security auditing for organizations.

cybersecurity.title: Reverse Engineering
cybersecurity.description: This course introduces you to reverse engineering, the concepts, and tools used worldwide by professionals.

cybersecurity.title: Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing
cybersecurity.description: This course introduces you to identify vulnerabilities in networks, applications, and organizations' infrastructure.

bigdata.title: Big Data & IoT
bigdata.description: This course is designed to provide foundational skills and knowledge prominently required across the emerging digitization technologies.

bigdata.title: Programming Essentials in Python I & II
bigdata.description: In this course, you'll gain the knowledge and skills to design, develop and improve multi-module computer application.

bigdata.title: IoT Fundamentals
bigdata.description: It develops foundational skills in the interdisciplinary domain of electronics, networking, security, data analytics, and business.
